channel.title: "home" (spawn)
channel.description:
Okay, i forgot all, everything on making a server, here is what i need to no.
Were can I find the coord's for my current home in (server) and how can i edit the teleporter, in teleport
like home: then switch the coord's...

item.title: "home" (spawn)
item.dc:creator: @BlacknRaven BlacknRaven
item.description:
@BlacknRaven wrote:

Ok its in playerjava you can log on your server with a new account and get the coords and search the coords in there or just search:

// initial x and y coordinates of the player
and it will look like this:

	// initial x and y coordinates of the player
	heightLevel = 0;
	// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
	teleportToX = 3220;//3220;
	teleportToY = 3423;//3423;

Read full topic
